alert.note: Alert for Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 4:43PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Todd County through 615 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sicangu Village, or 9 miles north of Valentine, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lakeview around 600 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
